reviewText: i have already watched 2 of the 7 disaster movies and they were so good and i had never seen them before. I love disaster movies. if you like disaster movies this is a good buy for 7 movies on 2 dvd discs
VERY GOOD MOVIES
lots of great movies i really enjoyed them

Seven films disaster films either caused by humans nature or biblical  in  firestorm 72 hours in Oakland A fire starts its put out quickly by the fire department  but it did not stay before you knew it  turns into A firestorm. Based on actual  event.  The other films Miami Magma dangerous deep sea drilling wakes up A sleeping volcano which threatens the city of Miami.  Death Flight  A experiment plane on flight with passengers has been sabotage by someone on the plane not realizing there's something more dangerous on board. Crash Landing and Crash dive are based on terrorist take overs Countdown Armageddon is the end of days and finally The President's Plane is Missing that's more suspense the president's plane crashes but was he on board which leads A reporter on A wild chase.  The movies all have action danger and double cross which makes them enjoyable.
ok
I love science fiction, great movies
Disaster movies are my favorite. I enjoyed the DVD and the picture was clear. I could not have been happier

The parcel arrived ahead of time. The selection was rather good. Well worth the $18.94 that I paid. If disaster movies are your thing then this is a must have for your collection.

Arrived on time and excellent condition. I found two the selections interesting seemed like the rest were repeats of others they seemed did not interest at me at all. I personally I think could find better selections. I personally Don't recommend but the seller yes.
The first 3 was ok didn't  like the other ones

The movies all had action but not the best story lines. The tape played well. But I am still glad I bought it.
great movie for a B rated movie
Lengthly movies, mostly about airline disasters but some are earthquakes.  Some are cheap-made, like B movies.

These are some good oldies and some with a great all star cast from yesteryear. Good filler movies, some better than others. Death Flight and The President's Plane is Missing are winners. Miami Magma (amazingly goofy title) is a classic B movie but all are watchable, even if to just give budding directors a place to work up from. Always fun to get several movies for a good price.
All good movies.  I enjoy this set very much.
Not Satisfied with this item.
